variable.name: individual_id
variable.description: Individual identifier: 150 = KN ( the Knowledge Networks web-enabled panel is a method for conducting Internet-based survey research with a U.S. representative probability sample), dash, then five digit ID#
variable.type: numbers: 150, dash, then five digit ID

variable.name: DSPLY17B
variable.description: Consent (on-line consent form)

variable.name: DSPLY20A
variable.description: Authorization (on-line consent form)

variable.name: A1A
variable.description: Have you ever had a time in your life when you felt sad, blue, or depressed for two weeks or more in a row?

variable.name: A1B
variable.description: Have you ever had a time in your life lasting two weeks or more when you lost interest in most things like hobbies, work, or activities that usually give you pleasure?

variable.name: A1C
variable.description: How much of the day did these feelings usually last?

variable.name: A1D
variable.description: Did you feel this way: please think of two-week period in your life when your feelings of depression or loss of interest were worst (every day, almost every day, less often).

variable.name: A2
variable.description: Did you feel more tired out or low on energy than is usual for you?

variable.name: A3
variable.description: Did you gain or lose weight without trying, or did you stay about the same weight?
variable.value: Stayed about the same or on a diet

variable.name: A3AA
variable.description: About how much weight did you gain?
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of pounds, -1, -2

variable.name: A3AB
variable.description: About how much weight did you lose?
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of pounds, -1, -2

variable.name: A3ACGAIN
variable.description: (Gained): about how much weight did you gain and lose?
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of pounds, -1, -2

variable.name: A3ACLOST
variable.description: (Lost): about how much weight did you gain and lose?
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of pounds, -1, -2

variable.name: A4
variable.description: Did you have more trouble falling asleep than you usually do?

variable.name: A4A
variable.description: How often did that happen?

variable.name: A5
variable.description: Did you have a lot more trouble concentrating than usual?

variable.name: A6
variable.description: People sometimes feel down on themselves, no good, or worthless. Did you feel this way?

variable.name: A7
variable.description: Did you think a lot about death - either your own, someone else's, or death in general?

variable.name: COUNT
variable.description: Count of 'yes' answers to A1B (Have you ever had a time in your life lasting two weeks or more when you lost interest in most things like hobbies, work, or activities that usually give you pleasure?), A2 (Did you feel more tired out or low on energy than is usual for you?), A3 (Did you gain or lose weight without trying, or did you stay about the same weight?), A4 (Did you have more trouble falling asleep than you usually do?), A5 (Did you have a lot more trouble concentrating than usual?), A6 (People sometimes feel down on themselves, no good, or worthless. Did you feel this way?), and A7 (Did you think a lot about death - either your own, someone else's, or death in general?).
variable.value: Count 1 of 'yes' answer to A1B, A2, A3, A4, A5, A6, and A7
Count of 2 'yes' answers to A1B, A2, A3, A4, A5, A6, and A7
Count of 3 'yes' answers to A1B, A2, A3, A4, A5, A6, and A7
count of 4 'yes' answers to A1B, A2, A3, A4, A5, A6, and A7
count of 5 'yes' answers to A1B, A2, A3, A4, A5, A6, and A7
count of 6 'yes' answers to A1B, A2, A3, A4, A5, A6, and A7
count of 7 'yes' answers to A1B, A2, A3, A4, A5, A6, and A7

variable.name: A8
variable.description: About how many weeks altogether did you feel this way? Count the weeks before, during and after the worst two weeks. The total period of depression/loss of interest was:
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of weeks, -1, -2

variable.name: A8A
variable.description: How many periods like this did you have in your life, lasting two or more weeks?
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of periods, -1, -2

variable.name: A8B
variable.description: About how old were you the FIRST time you had a period of two weeks like this? (Whether or not you received any help for it?) Years of age when you first felt this way
variable.type: numbers: integer for age in years -1, -2

variable.name: A8C
variable.description: About how old were you the LAST time you had a period of two weeks like this? (Whether or not you received any help for it?) Years of age when the most recent episode happened
variable.type: numbers: integer for age in years -1, -2

variable.name: A8D
variable.description: Did you ever tell a professional about these problems (medical doctor, psychologist, social worker, counselor, nurse, clergy, or other helping professional)?

variable.name: A8E
variable.description: Did you take medication or use drugs or alcohol more than once for these problems?

variable.name: A8F
variable.description: How much did these problems (feeling depression or loss of interest) interfere with your life or activities? (A lot, some, a little, not at all)

variable.name: B1
variable.description: Have you ever have a period lasting one month or longer when most of the time you felt worried, tense, or anxious?

variable.name: B1A
variable.description: People differ a lot in how much they worry about things. Did you ever have a time when you worried a lot more than most people would in your situation?

variable.name: B2YEARS
variable.description: (Years): what is the longest period of time that this kind of worrying has ever continued? Years and months
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of years, -1, -2

variable.name: B2MONTH
variable.description: (Months): what is the longest period of time that this kind of worrying has ever continued? years and months
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of months, -1, -2

variable.name: B2LIFE
variable.description: If no value to B2YEARS (variable) or B2MONTH (variable): all of my life/as long as I can remember?
variable.value: No all of my life/as long as I can remember
All of my life/as long as I can remember

variable.name: B4
variable.description: During that period (when you have felt worried, tense, anxious, or more worried than most people would in your situation), was your worry stronger than in other people?

variable.name: B5
variable.description: Did you worry most days?

variable.name: B6
variable.description: Did you usually worry about one particular thing, such as your job security or the failing health of a loved one, or more than one thing?

variable.name: B7
variable.description: Did you find it difficult to stop worrying?

variable.name: B8
variable.description: Did you ever have different worries on your mind at the same time?

variable.name: B9
variable.description: How often was your worry so strong that you couldn't put it out of your mind no matter how hard you tried?

variable.name: B10
variable.description: How often did you find it difficult to control your worry?

variable.name: B12_1
variable.description: When you were worried or anxious, were you also restless?

variable.name: B12_2
variable.description: When you were worried or anxious, were you also "keyed up or on edge"?

variable.name: B12_3
variable.description: When you were worried or anxious, were you also "easily tired"?

variable.name: B12_4
variable.description: When you were worried or anxious, were you also having difficulty keeping your mind on what you were doing?

variable.name: B12_5
variable.description: When you were worried or anxious, were you also more irritable than usual?

variable.name: B12_6
variable.description: When you were worried or anxious, were you also having tense, sore, or aching muscles?

variable.name: B12_7
variable.description: When you were worried or anxious, were you also often having trouble falling or staying asleep?

variable.name: B14
variable.description: Did you ever tell a professional about these problems (medical doctor, psychologist, social worker, counselor, nurse, clergy, or other helping professional)?

variable.name: B15
variable.description: Did you take medication or use drugs or alcohol more than once for the worry or the problems it was causing?

variable.name: B16
variable.description: How much did the worry or anxiety interfere with your life or activities?

variable.name: C1A_1
variable.description: Do you have an unreasonably strong fear or avoid any of the following things: heights, storms, thunder, lightning, or being in still water, like a swimming pool or lake?

variable.name: C1A_2
variable.description: Do you have an unreasonably strong fear or avoid any of the following things: being in a closed space like a cave, tunnel, elevator, or airplane?

variable.name: C1A_3
variable.description: Do you have an unreasonably strong fear or avoid any of the following things: snakes, birds, rats, bugs, or other animals?

variable.name: C1A_4
variable.description: Do you have an unreasonably strong fear or avoid any of the following things: seeing blood, getting a shot or injection, seeing a dentist, or going to a hospital?

variable.name: C2
variable.description: How often do you get upset when you are in that situation?
variable.value: Only one or two times ever
Only one or two times ever

variable.name: C4
variable.description: How long have you had any of these fears?
variable.value: Less than 1 year (please enter # of months below)

variable.name: C4DATA
variable.description: If C4 (How long have you had any of these fears?) is less than 1 year, please enter # of months
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of months, -1, -2

variable.name: C5
variable.description: How much have any of these fears ever interfered with your life or activities?

variable.name: C6
variable.description: Have you ever been very upset with yourself for having any of these fears?

variable.name: C7
variable.description: Is your fear unreasonable - that is, much stronger than it should be?

variable.name: C8
variable.description: Is your fear much stronger than in other people?

variable.name: D1_1
variable.description: Do you have an unreasonably strong fear or avoid any of the following situations: giving a speech or speaking in public?

variable.name: D1_2
variable.description: Do you have an unreasonably strong fear or avoid any of the following situations: eating or drinking where someone could watch you?

variable.name: D1_3
variable.description: Do you have an unreasonably strong fear or avoid any of the following situations: talking to people because you might have nothing to say or might sound foolish?

variable.name: D1_4
variable.description: Do you have an unreasonably strong fear or avoid any of the following situations: writing while someone watches?

variable.name: D1_5
variable.description: Do you have an unreasonably strong fear or avoid any of the following situations: taking part or speaking in a meeting or class?

variable.name: D1_6
variable.description: Do you have an unreasonably strong fear or avoid any of the following situations: going to a party or other social outing?

variable.name: D2
variable.description: How often do you get very upset when you are in this situation (unreasonable strong fears)?
variable.value: Only one or two times ever
Only one or two times ever

variable.name: D3
variable.description: How long have you had any of these fears (unreasonable strong fears)?
variable.value: Less than 1 year (please enter # of months below)

variable.name: D3DATA
variable.description: If D3 [How long have you had any of these fears (unreasonable strong fears)?] is less than 1 year, please enter # of months
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of months, -1, -2

variable.name: D4
variable.description: How much have any of these fears (unreasonable strong fears) ever interfered with your life or activities?

variable.name: D5
variable.description: Have you ever been very upset with yourself for having any of these fears (unreasonable strong fears)?

variable.name: D6
variable.description: Is your fear unreasonable - that is, much stronger than it should be?

variable.name: D7
variable.description: Is your fear much stronger than in other people?

variable.name: E1_1
variable.description: Do you have an unreasonably strong fear for or avoid any of the following: being in a crowd or standing in line?

variable.name: E1_2
variable.description: Do you have an unreasonably strong fear for or avoid any of the following: being away from home alone?

variable.name: E1_3
variable.description: Do you have an unreasonably strong fear for or avoid any of the following: traveling alone?

variable.name: E1_4
variable.description: Do you have an unreasonably strong fear for or avoid any of the following: traveling in a bus, train, or car?

variable.name: E1_5
variable.description: Do you have an unreasonably strong fear for or avoid any of the following: being in a public place like a department store?

variable.name: E2
variable.description: How often do you get very upset in the situation?
variable.value: Only one or two times ever

variable.name: E4
variable.description: How long have you had any of these fears?
variable.value: Less than 1 year (please enter # of months below)

variable.name: E4DATA
variable.description: If E4 (How long have you had any of these fears?) is less than 1 year, please enter # of months
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of months, -1, -2

variable.name: E5
variable.description: Were you ever afraid that you might faint, lose control, or embarrass yourself in other ways?

variable.name: E6
variable.description: Do you worry that you might be trapped without any way to escape?

variable.name: E7
variable.description: Do you worry that help might not be available if you needed it?

variable.name: E8
variable.description: How much did any of these fears ever interfere with your life or activities?

variable.name: F1
variable.description: Did you ever have a spell or an attack when all of a sudden you felt frightened, anxious, or very uneasy?

variable.name: F1A
variable.description: Did any of these attacks occur when you were in a life-threatening situation?

variable.name: F1B
variable.description: Did any of these attacks occur when you were not in a life-threatening situation?

variable.name: F2
variable.description: About how many attacks have you had in your life?
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of attacks, -1, -2

variable.name: F3
variable.description: How long ago did you have the most recent attack? - # months ago (enter 0 if you had one in the past month)
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of months, -1, -2

variable.name: F4
variable.description: Did some of your attacks happen in a situation when you were not in danger or not the center of attention?

variable.name: F5
variable.description: When you have sudden anxiety attacks, do they usually occur in specific situations that cause you unreasonably strong fear?

variable.name: F5A
variable.description: Did you ever have an attack when you were not in a situation that usually causes you to have unreasonably strong fears?

variable.name: F6_1
variable.description: When you have attacks: does your heart pound or race?

variable.name: F6_2
variable.description: When you have attacks: do you have tightness, pain, or discomfort in your chest or stomach?

variable.name: F6_3
variable.description: When you have attacks: do you sweat?

variable.name: F6_4
variable.description: When you have attacks: do you tremble or shake?

variable.name: F6_5
variable.description: When you have attacks: do you have hot flashes or chills?

variable.name: F6_6
variable.description: When you have attacks: do you, or things around you, seem unreal?

variable.name: G1
variable.description: The next questions are about how frequently you drink alcoholic beverages. By a "drink" we mean either: a bottle of beer, a wine cooler, a glass of wine, a shot of liquor, or a mixed drink. With these definitions in mind, what is the largest number of drinks you had in any single day ever?

variable.name: G2
variable.description: Was there ever a time in your life when your drinking or being hung over interfered with: your work at school, or your work at a job, or your home life or housework?

variable.name: G2A
variable.description: How often did drinking interfere with school, job or home life?

variable.name: G3
variable.description: Were you ever under the influence of alcohol in a situation where you could get hurt - like when driving a car or boat, using knives or guns or machinery, or anything else?

variable.name: G4
variable.description: Did you have any emotional or psychological problems from using alcohol - such as feeling uninterested in things, feeling depressed, suspicious of people, paranoid, or having strange ideas?

variable.name: G5
variable.description: Did you have such a strong desire or urge to drink that you could not keep from drinking?

variable.name: G6
variable.description: During that year, did you have a period of a month or more when you spent a great deal of time drinking or getting over the effects of alcohol?

variable.name: G7
variable.description: Did you ever have more to drink than you intended to, or did you drink much longer than you intended to?

variable.name: G7A
variable.description: During that year, how often did you drink more or longer than you intended to?

variable.name: G8
variable.description: During that year, was there ever a time when you had to drink much more than you used to drink, to get the same effect you wanted?

variable.name: H1_1
variable.description: The next questions are about your use of drugs on your own. By "on your own" we mean either without a doctor's prescription, in larger amounts than prescribed, or for longer than prescribed. With this definition in mind, did you ever use any of the following drugs on your own? Sedatives, including either barbiturates or sleeping pills? (Seconal, Halcion, Methaqualone, etc.)

variable.name: H1_2
variable.description: The next questions are about your use of drugs on your own. By "on your own" we mean either without a doctor's prescription, in larger amounts than prescribed, or for longer than prescribed. With this definition in mind, did you ever use any of the following drugs on your own? Tranquilizers or "nerve pills"? (Librium, Valium, Ativan, Meprobamate, Xanax, etc.)

variable.name: H1_3
variable.description: The next questions are about your use of drugs on your own. By "on your own" we mean either without a doctor's prescription, in larger amounts than prescribed, or for longer than prescribed. With this definition in mind, did you ever use any of the following drugs on your own? Amphetamines or other stimulants? (Methamphetamine, Preludin, Dexedrine, Ritalin, "Speed")

variable.name: H1_4
variable.description: The next questions are about your use of drugs on your own. By "on your own" we mean either without a doctor's prescription, in larger amounts than prescribed, or for longer than prescribed. With this definition in mind, did you ever use any of the following drugs on your own? Analgesics or other prescription painkillers on your own? (This does NOT include normal use of aspirin, Tylenol without codeine, Advil, etc., but does include use of Tylenol with codeine and other prescription painkillers like Demerol, Darvon, Percodan, Codeine, Morphine, and Methadone.)

variable.name: H1_5
variable.description: The next questions are about your use of drugs on your own. By "on your own" we mean either without a doctor's prescription, in larger amounts than prescribed, or for longer than prescribed. With this definition in mind, did you ever use any of the following drugs on your own? Inhalants that you sniff or breathe to get high or to feel good? (Amylnitrate, Freon, Nitrous Oxide, "Whippets", gasoline, spray paint, etc.)

variable.name: H1_6
variable.description: The next questions are about your use of drugs on your own. By "on your own" we mean either without a doctor's prescription, in larger amounts than prescribed, or for longer than prescribed. With this definition in mind, did you ever use any of the following drugs on your own? Marijuana or hashish?

variable.name: H1_7
variable.description: The next questions are about your use of drugs on your own. By "on your own" we mean either without a doctor's prescription, in larger amounts than prescribed, or for longer than prescribed. With this definition in mind, did you ever use any of the following drugs on your own? Cocaine or crack or free base?

variable.name: H1_8
variable.description: The next questions are about your use of drugs on your own. By "on your own" we mean either without a doctor's prescription, in larger amounts than prescribed, or for longer than prescribed. With this definition in mind, did you ever use any of the following drugs on your own? LSD or other hallucinogens? (PCP, angeldust, peyote, ecstasy-MDMA, mescaline, etc.)

variable.name: H1_9
variable.description: The next questions are about your use of drugs on your own. By "on your own" we mean either without a doctor's prescription, in larger amounts than prescribed, or for longer than prescribed. With this definition in mind, did you ever use any of the following drugs on your own? Heroin?

variable.name: H3
variable.description: Did your use of any of these substances ever interfere with: your work at school, or your work at a job, or your home life or housework?

variable.name: H3A
variable.description: How often did using any substances interfere with school, job or home life?

variable.name: H4
variable.description: Were you ever under the influence of any of these substances in a situation where you could get hurt - like when driving a car or boat, using knives or guns or machinery, or anything else?

variable.name: H5
variable.description: Did you have any emotional or psychological problems from using any of these substances - such as feeling uninterested in things, feeling depressed, suspicious of people, paranoid, or having strange ideas?

variable.name: H6
variable.description: Did you have such a strong desire or urge to use any of these substances that you could not keep from using it?

variable.name: H7
variable.description: Did you have a period of a month or more when you spent a great deal of time using any of these substances or getting over their effects?

variable.name: H8
variable.description: Did you ever use any of these substances in much larger amounts, or for a longer period of time, than you intended to?

variable.name: H8A
variable.description: During that year, how often did you use any of these substances more or longer than you intended to?

variable.name: H9
variable.description: Was there ever a time when you had to use more of any of these substances than you used to, to get the same effect you wanted?

variable.name: I1
variable.description: Have you ever been bothered by having certain unpleasant thoughts of your own that kept entering your mind against your wishes? An example would be if you kept having the idea that your hands are dirty or have germs on them.

variable.name: I2
variable.description: Another example of an unpleasant thought would if you kept having the idea that you might harm someone, even though you really didn't want to. Or you might have had thoughts you were ashamed of, but couldn't keep out of your mind. Have you ever had any unpleasant and persistent thoughts like that?

variable.name: I3
variable.description: Did some of these thoughts seem to you to be unreasonable?

variable.name: I4
variable.description: Did these thoughts keep coming back again and again into your mind no matter how hard you tried to resist, ignore, or get rid of them?

variable.name: I5
variable.description: Did you ever tell a doctor about these thoughts?

variable.name: I6
variable.description: Did thinking about these ideas interfere with your life or work, or cause you difficulty with your relatives or friends, or upset you a great deal?

variable.name: I7
variable.description: Some people have the unpleasant feeling that they have to do something over and over again even though they know it is foolish, but they can't resist doing it - things like washing their hands again and again or going back several times to be sure they've locked a door or turned off the stove. Have you ever had to do something like that over and over?

variable.name: I8
variable.description: Was there a time when you felt you had to do something in a certain order, like getting dressed perhaps, and had to start all over again if you did it in the wrong order?

variable.name: I9
variable.description: Has there been a period of several weeks when you felt you had to count something, like the squares in a tile floor, and couldn't resist doing it even when you tried to?

variable.name: I10
variable.description: Did you have a period when you had to say certain words over and over, either aloud or to yourself?

variable.name: I13
variable.description: Did you think that these actions were unnecessary or that you overdid it?

variable.name: I14
variable.description: Did you tell a doctor about having to do these things?

variable.name: I15
variable.description: Did having to do these things interfere with your life or work, or cause you difficulty with your relatives or friends, or upset you a great deal?

variable.name: M1
variable.description: Have you smoked more than 100 cigarettes in your lifetime?

variable.name: M2
variable.description: Have you ever smoked a whole cigarette?

variable.name: M2A
variable.description: How many cigarettes have you smoked in your lifetime?
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of cigarettes, -1, -2

variable.name: M3A
variable.description: Did you smoke cigarettes on a daily basis?

variable.name: M3B
variable.description: How many cigarettes did you smoke on a typical day?
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of cigarettes, -1, -2

variable.name: M3C
variable.description: During this time when you smoked the most, how soon after waking did you smoke your first cigarette?

variable.name: M3D
variable.description: Did you find it difficult to refrain from smoking in places where it is forbidden, e.g., in church, at the library, in the cinema, etc.?

variable.name: M3E
variable.description: During this period, which one cigarette would you have hated most to give up?

variable.name: M3F
variable.description: During this period, did you smoke more frequently during the first hours after waking than during the rest of the day?

variable.name: M3G
variable.description: During this period, did you smoke if you are so ill that you are in bed most of the day?

variable.name: M4
variable.description: Do you currently smoke cigarettes?

variable.name: M4A
variable.description: How many cigarettes do you smoke in a typical day?
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of cigarettes, -1, -2

variable.name: M4BYEARS
variable.description: (Years): how long has it been since you quit smoking? Years and months
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of years, -1, -2

variable.name: M4BMONTH
variable.description: (Months): how long has it been since you quit smoking? Years and months
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of months, -1, -2

variable.name: M5
variable.description: Do you consider yourself to be (heterosexual, bisexual, gay or lesbian, I would prefer to not answer this question)
variable.value: I would prefer to not answer this question

variable.name: M6AFEET
variable.description: (Feet): please enter your current height in feet and inches
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of feet, -1, -2

variable.name: M6AINCH
variable.description: (Inches): please enter your current height in feet and inches
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of inches, -1, -2

variable.name: M6AWT
variable.description: Please enter below your current weight in pounds:
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of pounds, -1, -2

variable.name: M6AGWT
variable.description: What is the greatest weight ever in your life (excluding pregnancy or 6 months after delivery)
variable.type: numbers: integer for number of pounds, -1, -2

variable.name: M7GRID_1
variable.description: Have you ever received treatment for, or been diagnosed with, any of the following conditions: schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder

variable.name: M7GRID_2
variable.description: Have you ever received treatment for, or been diagnosed with, any of the following conditions: hearing voices others could not hear or believing things that others said were not true (such as that people were trying to harm you)

variable.name: M7GRID_3
variable.description: Have you ever received treatment for, or been diagnosed with, any of the following conditions: bipolar disorder (manic-depression)

variable.name: NGRID_1
variable.description: Does your mood often go up and down?

variable.name: NGRID_2
variable.description: Do you ever feel 'just miserable' for no reason?

variable.name: NGRID_3
variable.description: Are you an irritable person?

variable.name: NGRID_4
variable.description: Are your feelings easily hurt?

variable.name: NGRID_5
variable.description: Do you often feel 'fed-up'?

variable.name: NGRID_6
variable.description: Would you call yourself a nervous person?

variable.name: NGRID_7
variable.description: Are you a worrier?

variable.name: NGRID_8
variable.description: Would you call yourself tense or 'highly-strung'?

variable.name: NGRID_9
variable.description: Do you worry too long after an embarrassing experience?

variable.name: NGRID_10
variable.description: Do you suffer from 'nerves'?

variable.name: NGRID_11
variable.description: Do you often feel lonely?

variable.name: NGRID_12
variable.description: Are you often troubled about feelings of guilt?

variable.name: NGRID_13
variable.description: Are you a talkative person?

variable.name: NGRID_14
variable.description: Are you rather lively?

variable.name: NGRID_15
variable.description: Do you enjoy meeting new people?

variable.name: NGRID_16
variable.description: Can you usually let yourself go and enjoy yourself at a lively party?

variable.name: NGRID_17
variable.description: Do you usually take the initiative in making new friends?

variable.name: NGRID_18
variable.description: Can you easily get some life into a rather dull party?

variable.name: NGRID_19
variable.description: Do you tend to keep in the background on social occasions?

variable.name: NGRID_20
variable.description: Do you like mixing with people?

variable.name: NGRID_21
variable.description: Do you like plenty of bustle and excitement around you?

variable.name: NGRID_22
variable.description: Are you mostly quiet when you are with other people?

variable.name: NGRID_23
variable.description: Do other people think of you as being very lively?

variable.name: NGRID_24
variable.description: Can you get a party going?
